charges.charge_description: 18:13-7220.P TRAFFIC OFFENSES, OTHER-Failure to Obey, NYVTL 1110 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: On Count 1 of complaint as amended to Failure to Obey, deft. is sentence to pay a fine of $100.00, payable immediately, and enroll in an alcohol and drug prevention and control program. Deft. to furnish court with proof of completion by 7/10/96 (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:13-7220.P TRAFFIC OFFENSES, OTHER-Stopping without cause or timely signal (NYVTL 1163(c)) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Violation Notice dismissed on motion of government (2)

charges.charge_description: Operating a motor vehicle while ability impaired by alcohol, BAC of.09% (NYVTL 1192.1) and Stopping without timely signal (NYVTL 1163(c))
